How many brothers and sisters do you have?

trv: 2 ka qbsoran mo rseno ma mqedil, 1 ge swai mqedil.
english: I have two brothers and sisters and one younger brother and sister.

trv: Piya namo heyi kana sapah namo?
english: How many people are in your family?
There are four of us in our family.

trv: Swai na tama mo ka heya.
Ga meepah maano ka swai bobo so?
english: What does your uncle do for a living?

trv: Niqan qpahor na qbsoran mqedil so?
english: Does your sister have a job?

trv: Ye seediq tmposo ka qedil so?

english: Yes, but she's from the Paiwan tribe.
Yes, we are all very tall.

trv: Ye wada mooyas ptasan ka swai so mqedil?
english: Does your sister go to school?

trv: Un, wada mosa mooyas sapah pyasan di.
Ye mkela rmengo kari seediq ka swai so?
english: Do your siblings speak the language?

trv: Un, mkela rmengo kari seediq ka dheya.
english: Yes, they speak the ethnic language.
How many brothers and sisters do you have?
I have three brothers and sisters.

trv: Ye so gaga msoopo tama bobo meniq sapah.
english: Do you live with your parents?

trv: Un, msoopo ko tama bobo mo meniq sapah.
english: Yes, I live with my mom and dad.

trv: Ye so gaga msoopo meniq tama rodan ma bobo rodan?
english: Do you live with your grandparents?

trv: Ini, ini ko psoopo dheya meniq sapah.
english: No, I didn't live with them.

trv: Ima ga so spoon meniq sapah.
Msoopo ko tama bobo ma qbsorn mo meniq sapah.
english: I live with my father, mother and brother.

trv: Maha so knowan ka alang so?
english: When are you going back to the tribe?
I will go back in the summer.

trv: Pkriyak ka hido de, mtilox ka karat.
english: The sun is coming out, it's very hot.
Is it going to be cold outside?
It's cold, so wear more clothes.

trv: Ini, niqan bgihor di, mtleto ba.
Ini ksekoy ma ini ktilox saya, malo ba.
english: It's neither cold nor hot today, very comfortable.

trv: Uka plabo ka karat, pkriyak kana pngerah di.
english: There were no clouds in the sky; the stars came out.

trv: Hani mosowan, pkriyak ka hido, pkriyak ka hako otox di.
english: The rain has just stopped, the sun has come out, the rainbow is coming out.

trv: Hmowa karat gaga so niqon hiya?
english: What's the weather like where you are?
We're going to have a big storm here.
Very well, out of the big sun.
I have to go to school.

trv: Msekoy ka karat, keego hari mlokos.
english: The weather is very cold, so wear more clothes.

trv: Mqoyox kiyahari, iya chongi madis trasi.
english: It's going to rain heavily, you have to remember to bring an umbrella.

trv: Mnbrowa soni, yaani mpqoyox kiya hari.
english: There was thunder just now, and it's supposed to rain later.

trv: Mnbrowa soni, yaani mpqoyox kiya hari.

english: It just rained, and now it's stopped.

trv: So hari qmnoyox, mhoriq ka elo.
english: It seems to have rained and the road is wet.

trv: Ye qmnoyox? Ma mhoriq kana heyi so?
english: Is it raining? Why are you all wet?

trv: Gaga qmoyox ka ngangoc, ini ko adis trasi.
english: It's raining outside, so I didn't bring an umbrella.

trv: Paro ba bgihor, mnarox ka tonox mo nyopan na.
english: The wind is blowing so hard that my head hurts.

trv: Paro ba hido, mtgiya tonox mo pnhdagan na.
english: The sun is so big, it makes me dizzy.
I forgot to bring my pen.
I forgot to bring my chopsticks.

trv: Ini ko adis ori, saye ta mari ho.
english: I don't have one either, let's go buy one.
Let's go buy a pen, shall we?
Well, I still have to buy erasers.

trv: Seye ta mari oqon mgrebo ho?
english: Let's go get breakfast, shall we?

trv: Uxe ko, mnekan ko sapah di.
english: No, I've already eaten at home.
I forgot to steam my lunchbox.
I forgot to bring my lunchbox.
Then let's eat my lunch box together!
What are you having for lunch?
I want a nutritious school lunch.

trv: Meekan so maano ka ceka hido.
english: What are you having for lunch?

trv: Mnadis ko handayo ali saya, soopo ta mekan ceka naali ho?
english: I've brought a lunchbox today, let's eat together at noon!

trv: Saye ta theyaq boro rancyo ho?
english: Let's go play basketball, shall we?
Please help me with the broom.
Okay, here's a broomstick for you.

trv: Dyagi ko mangan galiq sseros ho?
english: Can you help me with the cloth?

trv: Nii ko smkesik, plwani Walis mege iso.
english: I'm sweeping the floor and you asked Walis to help you with it.

trv: Rodiq ka dheran, sayi smeros tikoh.
english: The floor is dirty, go clean it.

trv: Un, saye ko mangan galiq sseros.
english: Okay, I'll go get the cloth.

trv: rotiq ka mado gaga, sayi smeros tikoh.
english: That window is very dirty, go clean it.

trv: Iya han, ini mo sseki ka hini na.
english: Wait a minute, I'm not done sweeping here yet.
I'm going to see my teacher.
What do you do after school?

trv: Mpsnegon ko dangi mo maha mooyas oyas.
english: I'm going to sing with my friends.
She's at home, please come in.

trv: Uka hini heya, maano gimon so ho?
english: She's not here, what can I do for you?

trv: Tama rodan, yako Samo, rwahi ko.
english: Grandpa, I'm Samu, please open the door.

trv: Yako tomon, meyah ko theyaq iso.
english: I'm tumun, I've come to play with you.

trv: Sndamac so. bsiyaq ta ini tqita di.
Kiya na, lnglongon somo bale, nahari prengo ta!
english: Yeah! I miss you so much. Come on, let's chat!
Please sit down and have some tea.

trv: Ah! Malo ba mahan ka ocya namo.
Malo ma, so ba malo oqon qtaan ka sweko nii.
Mahada hnpore na bobo di, eyah nahari mekan.
english: Mom has cooked dinner, come and eat!

trv: Un, saye ko trima baga han.
english: Okay, I'll go wash my hands.

trv: Kntengi mekan, oxe so seediq ngangoc.
english: Try to eat and drink as much as possible, you're not an outsider.

trv: Ego pnoqan mo da, mtengi ko bale.
english: I ate a lot, I'm full.

trv: Maha ko han, yahon so qmita bobo na di.
english: I'm leaving, I'll see you next time.

trv: Keeman da, maha ko sapa di.
Un, eyah theyaq sapah mo niqan ali so.
english: Okay, come to my house sometime.

trv: Malo namo ho, deson mako alang smiling rdrodan.
english: Hello everyone, today I'm taking you to the tribe to interview the elders.

trv: Malo o! maha ta rmengo kari seediq rdrodan.
english: Yes! We're going to talk to the seniors in Sederic.

trv: Tama rodan/baki, meyah nami qmita iso.
english: Grandpa, we've come to see you.

trv: Han! Han! Mkela namo rmengo kari ta seediq, teyan bale knmalo.
Malo namo ho, deso mako meepah phmaan maco.
english: Hello everyone, today I will take you to work in the millet field.

trv: Eyah mtbeko kana, adis ba pareh kana qqeya.
english: Come and line up, remember to bring your tools.

trv: Un, mptgesa, nii nami deso kana qqeya.
english: Yes, sir, we've got our tools.
Not yet, it's still far away.
You go get the bird catcher.

trv: Un, saye mo madok ka qbheni.
english: Okay, I'll go and catch the birds.

trv: Malo namo ho? Maha ta Tongwoyen ali saya.
english: Hello everyone, we are going to the zoo today.

trv: Teyan ba knmalo! Mhowa ta mesa mosa?
english: Awesome! How are we going to get there?

trv: Bleiq mtbeko kana, mbari ta kipo.
english: Everyone line up, we are ready to buy tickets.

trv: Berah na ge qqbheni, bokoy na ge qoyo, qtai naq kana ta.
english: There are birds in the front and snakes in the back.

trv: Ini howa, osa qmita qbeheni iso deno.
english: It doesn't matter, then you go and watch the birds.

trv: Bobo 1 patis hido de, eyah ta mtbeko msseli hini.
english: We'll be back in an hour.

trv: Mnita ko ego ba qoyo ma ego ba qqbheni.
english: I saw a lot of snakes and a lot of birds.
Hurry up, we have to go.

trv: Tri ko tikoh, nii moowic ka papak mo.
english: Wait for me, my feet are tired.

trv: Ego riyong seediq nii lmangoy hini.
english: There are a lot of people swimming here.

trv: Rcilong mgtoma hiya, enaq ta lmangoy hini ka ita.
english: The water is deep there, so we just swim here.
What kind of car did you take?
How do you go to church?

trv: Paanon ko rolo tama msoopo mosa.
howa mesa mosa sapah pyasan klaali?
english: How does he usually go to school?

trv: Taapa ceyon ka heya mosa sapah pyasan.
english: He took the subway to school.

trv: Howa mesa mosa maroy damac ka payi so?
english: How does your grandmother go to the grocery store?

trv: Taapa otobay mosa maroy damac ka heya.
english: She went to the grocery store on a motorcycle.
How are you going to get to Orchid Island?
I want to take a boat to Lanyu.

trv: Howa mesa mosa ranyi ka heya?
english: How did he get to Orchid Island?

trv: Maha taapa aso skiya mosa ranyi ka heya.
english: He took a plane to Orchid Island.

trv: Taapa maano mosa Kawsyong ka heya?
english: What bus did he take to Kaohsiung?

trv: Taapa Kawte mosa kawsyong ka heya.
english: He took the THSR to Kaohsiung.

trv: Tnaapa rolo qrengon mosa Taytong ka heya?
english: Did he take a train to Taitung?

trv: Un, tnaapa rolo qrengon mosa Taytong ka heya.
english: Yes, he took a train to Taitung.

trv: Uxe, tnaapa aso skiya mosa Taytong ka heya.
english: No, he took a plane to Taitung.
Is there a bus stop near here?

trv: Niqan, qtaon so twason baso mqori so daya.
english: Yes, if you go straight ahead, you will see the bus stop.

trv: Gaga ino daling hari Ceyon peeyah hini?
english: Where is the nearest MRT station?

trv: Uka sngayan ceyon ka hini, asi so ka taapa haya.
english: There is no MRT station here, you can only take a taxi.

trv: knheno bsiyaq taapa baso mosa sapah pyasan?
english: How long does it take to get to the school by bus?

trv: 15 qnedis patis hido pdehok sapah pyasan.
Knheno bsiyaq taapa Kawte pdehok mosa Taycong?
english: How long does it take to get to Taichung by THSR?
I will come to Taichung in an hour.

trv: Ye maha bsiyaq mgeriq rolo mosa Uray?
english: Is it a long drive to Ulai?

trv: Knheno bsiyaq taapa so Ceyon meyah sapah mo?
english: How long did it take you to come to my house by subway?
Do you know how to ride a bicycle?

trv: Ye malo meyah ko smiling iso?

english: Don't, I don't know much about it.

trv: Ye niqan ali so bbiyan? Mkmosa ko smiling sonan, malo ho?
english: Are you free this afternoon? I'd like to visit you, is that okay?
Okay, I'll wait for you at home.

english: Do your kids live in the tribe too?

trv: Ini, ga meniq alang paro ka laqi mo.
english: No, my kids are all living in the city.
Then, do you live by yourself?

trv: Ga ko tmabo kingal holing ma kingal qbheni, tnsapah mo ka dheya dori.
english: I also keep a dog and a bird. They are my family.

trv: Tmabo ko kingal ngiyo ka yako, malo niqal tnbogan, tthiqon tikoh skdeson peni.
english: I have a cat too. I won't get bored with the company of my pet.

trv: Ni ko msiling iso pgyaon mosa pholing wa!
english: I would like to ask you about the taboos of hunting.

trv: Ini keego ka klaon mo dori. Ani si, sprengo mo da knklaan mo.
english: I don't know much about that, but I will tell you everything I know.

trv: Niqal maano ka pgyaon Qyqeya Pholing?
english: Do you have any taboos about hunting weapons?

trv: Ini ptlengi mmqedil ka Qyqeya Pholing.
english: Our hunting weapons are untouchable to women.

trv: Ma, ye ini howa mosa pholing ka mmqedil dori ha?
english: Then, can women go hunting together?

trv: Ini! Ini srwai pholing ka mmqedil dori.
english: No, women cannot go hunting either.

trv: Awi, oka sino da! Sai tikoh maroy!
english: Awi, our home is out of rice wine, please go and buy some.

trv: Ga prayan hi ka kingal rosoq nana, anaq ini baroy hayan!
english: There is still one bottle left in the kitchen, so there is no need to buy one!

trv: Ini baka kingal rosoq, osa maroy daha rosoq dongal.
english: One bottle is not enough for me, go and buy two more back.

trv: Mbaroy ko sino. Ya namo ga gnbaroy sino?
english: I am looking for rice wine. Do you have any rice wine?
Yes! How many bottles do you need?

trv: Daha rosoq, ma kingal loboy beras.
english: I want two bottles and a pack of rice.

trv: Nii ka beras, maano ngalon so dongal?
english: Here is the rice, what else do you need?
I want to buy some clothes.
What kind of clothes do you like?
I want to buy the clothes with short sleeves.
We have white and blue ones too.
Please give me the clothes in blue.

trv: Awi, mnosa so ino ka soni? Mnosa so pstarin?
english: Awi, where have you been just now? Did you go exercising?

trv: Uxe, snkgolan ko pai mosa maroy sama.
english: No, I went grocery shopping for my grandma.

trv: Ye kiya! Niqal ali so keeman? Spowe ta mekan ido.
english: No wonder! Are you available at night? Would you like to have a meal with me?

trv: Bobo na da ho? Maha ko maroy lokos.
english: No, I want to buy some clothes.
Then, I will go with you.

trv: Sndamac so bale! Piya pila ka sama nii?
english: Hello, how much is this bunch of vegetables?
The vegetables are $20 for a bunch.
How much are these sweet potatoes?
Sweet potatoes are thirty dollars for a pound.

trv: Biqi ko daha bnkeyan sama, ma kingal toting bonga.
english: Please give me two bunches of vegetables and a pound of sweet potatoes.

trv: Awi, ni ko cmhongi madis ppatis, kbrexi ko tikoh niso han ho?
english: Sudu, I forgot to bring my pen. Can you lend me one?

trv: Mowa kbrexon sako tikoh? Maha somo asi prihi naq saya.
english: Can you lend me the pen for a second? I will return to you immediately.

trv: Mhowe so bale, mhowe so bale kesa ka Padiq dori.
english: Thank you and thank Padiq for me.
I want to return these two books.
No problem and what else do you need?

trv: Pkbarox ko tero patis nii dori.
english: I would like to borrow these three books.

trv: Un, hadi hini da bobo mktero ali.
english: Sure and remember to return them after three days.

trv: Ini sako hadi hini ka seros nana.
english: You haven't returned me the eraser.

trv: Wada somo hadon ciga da hayan.
Ma wada oka ka seros mo dori di?
english: Then, why is my eraser missing?

trv: Uxe so wada skbarox Awi di peni!
english: Did you lend it to Awi?

trv: Ini mo klai wa. Hae mo smiling hayan.
english: I don't know. I will go and ask her.
I will lend you my eraser first.

trv: Padiq, knbrexan sona Awi ka lokos pbabo nii?
english: Padiq, did Awi lend you this coat?

trv: Uxe, bnaroy kona bobo mo ka nii.
english: No, my mom bought it for me.

trv: Mntena bale ka lokos pbabo namo yamo ka Awi.
english: Awi's coat is the same as yours.

trv: Qalox lokos pbabo na ka heya. Ini pntena ka rako nami.
english: His coat is black, so our colors are different.

trv: Padiq, ye so knbarox pila na Awi ka iso ha?
english: ,Padiq did you borrow money from Awi?

trv: Kiya ma, naka mo bale prihon saya, ni ko cmhongi madis pila da.
english: Yes, I was supposed to return to him today, but I forgot to bring the money.

trv: So kiya de, prrihon so knowan deno?
english: Then, when will you return the money?

trv: Oo, sae somo mrengo Awi deno.
english: Okay, I will tell Awi for you.

trv: Sqapi btonox ka qolic, ma sdorang snoyok ka tkorih.
english: It is correct to catch mice through rangay and catch bamboo partridges through qjiulang.

trv: Kela naq so kiya, ni ko qnooqo da! Kiya oka ba ka nngalan mo.
english: No wonder! I am mistaken and that's why I cannot catch any of them.

trv: Tgsae somo smmalo daha spoosa tmlenga nii dongal.
english: Then I will teach you how to set up these two traps.

trv: Bale, malo wa! Maha ko maangal bobo na deno!
english: Great! I will be able to catch the prey in the future.

trv: Egow ba sodo hmnero yqeyaq ni da! Sai mangal kagol ga sapah, maha ta tmatak sodo yqeyaq.
english: The grass in the fields is too tall. Go to the warehouse to take the sickle and let's go to the fields.

trv: Gaga siyo btoko, remox so sapah, maha so asi qtai.
english: It is next to the round basket. You will see it when you enter the warehouse.

trv: Tai hari mangal so, ngale so loqah, mhongon bale ka kagol.
english: Be careful and don't get hurt. The sickle is very sharp.

trv: Ga toma qhoni waga ka dorang mo.
english: My trap is under that tree.

trv: Niqal pnskraya mo hini, klaon mo naq ga ino ka dorang mo.
english: I make a mark here, so I know where my trap is.

trv: Nii ge, kobo qcorox, psaon miyan roro saangal qcorox.
english: This is a fish trap which we put beside the river for fishing.

trv: Uka miyan kobo qcorox ka yami, pllingon miyan ka mangal qcorox.
english: We don't have any fish traps there, so we catch fish with a fishing rod.

trv: Ini ko plaling mnnexan ka yako, mowa tgsaon sako ka bobo na?
english: I have never used a fishing rod before, would you mind teaching me next time?

trv: Malo wa! Spowe ta mosa plaling ka bobo na deno.
english: Sure! Let's go fishing together next time.

trv: Ma tgsae somo smmalo kobo qcorox bobo da dori.
english: I will teach you how to make a fish trap next time.

trv: Mlgelo pnlingan so da! Ye oxe ga tdiyan qcorox di? Nleelo blebil!
english: Your fishing rod is moving. Isn't the fish on the hook? Pull it up!

trv: Trai tikoh hayan, mlgelo riyong ka aso. Blbilo mo hini, sai mangal tikoh ka kadi waga.
english: Wait, the ship is rolling heavily. I am here to pull the fishing rod and you should go there to grab me the net.

trv: Blbili qori hini ka qcorox, dyage somo blebil.
english: Pull the fish to my side and I will help you pull it up.

trv: Keyan bale knmalo! Stenge rawa Nnngalanl ta qcorox di.
english: Great! It is a bumper crop today with full fish baskets.

trv: Hae ta nleelow mosa msaaso sapah hiya.
english: Let's go back immediately and share it with everyone.

trv: iya theyaq di, Nhari tlong tloongan.
english: Stop playing and quickly sit in your seat.

trv: Ali gndregan rima ka saya, mdoro ka koson, nita soopo theyaq!
english: It's Friday today, we have a day off tomorrow. Let's go out and play together!
Great! Let's go to the riverside.
What day will it be tomorrow?

trv: Ali gndregan tero koson, koson bobo mnekan nita theyaq cobo!
english: Tomorrow will be Wednesday. Let's go play ball tomorrow afternoon!
What will you be doing tomorrow morning?

trv: Ali gndregan ka koson, yami bobo mo maha miyan sapah thmokowan.
english: Tomorrow will be Sunday, I will be going to church with my mom.

trv: nii ko mpbheriq, maha ko benjyo.
english: I feel like vomiting. I need to go to the restroom.

trv: Mptgesa, nii ko mnarox nboyas, maha ko benjyo.
english: Teacher, I have a stomachache. I need to go to the restroom.
May I go wash my hands?

trv: Uxe beyo msange di, osa kiya hari.
english: It's almost time for class to end. Wait a little longer.

trv: mptgesa, niko mnarox tonox, mdro ko bobo mnekan.
english: It's almost time for class to end. Wait a little longer.
Okay, take care and go home.

trv: Mptgesa, mdro ko meyah ali gndregan kingal, maha ko pqita ising.
english: Teacher, I need to take a sick leave next Monday. I have to see a doctor.

trv: Gaga mnarox nboyas, ga meniq benjyo.
english: She has a stomachache. She's in the restroom.

trv: mptgesa, mnarox gelo ka Awi, mdro ka ali saya.
english: Teacher, Awi has a sore throat. She took a sick leave today.

trv: Tado ko Walis, maxal ka knkawas mo saya.
english: My name is Walis, and I'm 10 years old.
What ethnic group are you from?

trv: Ye Seediq kana ka tnsapah so?
english: Are all your family members indigenous?
Yes, my whole family is Seediq.
Are all your family members indigenous?

trv: oxe, Seediq ka tama mo mokan ka bobo mo.
english: No, my father is Seediq, and my mother is Han Taiwanese.

trv: Laqi ko na Awi Temo ka yako.
Ima ka tamas so? Piya ka knkawas na heya di?
english: Is that your father? How old is he?

trv: keno ka tama so? Piya ka knkawas na di?
english: Is that your father? How old is he?

trv: Uxe, rodan alang miyan ka heya, mmsepac kmxalan ka knkawas na.
english: No, he is an elder of our tribe. He is 80 years old.

trv: piya knkawas na ka qbsoron so rseno?
Maxal mmsepac knkawas na ka qbsoran mo rseno.
ye hmrinsa ego knkawas na qbsoran rseno so daka iso?
english: Is your brother much older than you?

trv: Kingal kbekoy msptaon snkokoh qndisan knbbaro mo ka yako.
Bsiyaq ta ini pqita, nii so so hari mdakil di?
english: I haven't seen you in a while. Have you grown taller?

trv: kiya ma kingal mteron snkokoh qndisan knbbaro mo ka yako.
Maha ko sapah ptasan skadi mptgesa.
english: I'm going to the office to see the teacher.
He's going to throw away the trash.

trv: Gaga han rmangoy, maha psseong rmangoy kiya hari.
english: He's at the swimming pool. He's going to compete in a swimming competition later.

trv: Gaga ino Ape? Maha psseong tmalang kiya hari.
english: Where is Ape? She's going to compete in a running competition later.
She's in the auditorium. I'll go call her.
Let's go to the playground together.

trv: Maha ko skadi iso kiya hari, hae ko mari poqon ceka naali han.
english: I'll go buy lunch first, and then I'll meet you later.
Let's carry the lunch boxes together!

trv: Maha ko skadi mptgesa, osa skadi seediq.
english: You find someone else, I'm going to find the teacher.

trv: Iyong maha so psseong cobo biciq ka saya?
english: Is Iyung competing in croquet today?
No, he's competing in high jump.

trv: Ye so maha psseong tmalang psseong pstarin ali ciida?
english: Will you compete in the sports day?

trv: Mphowa ta ail Psseong pstarin ciida?
english: What will we do in the sports day?
We will compete in tug of war.

trv: Ye ta gmbari ppoqon ka psseong pstarin?
english: Will we sell food at the sports day?
Congratulations on getting first place! You're amazing!

trv: Ye gaga sapah ka bobo rodan?

english: Yes, she's sleeping in her room.

trv: Uka hii, wada ngerac, meyah keeman sapah di.
english: No, she's not. She just went out and will be back in the evening.

trv: Ye gaga sapah ka tama rodan?

english: He's upstairs. You can go up and find him.

trv: Awi, bsiyaq somo ini qtai di, malo so?
english: It's Awi. I haven't seen you in a while! How have you been?

trv: Malo ko wa! Meyah ko theyaq iso.
english: I'm doing great! I came to chat with you.

trv: Gaga tnsiyos sama prayan, hae mo mlawa.
english: He's in the kitchen cooking. Let me go call him.
She went to the chicken coop to catch chickens.

trv: Uka sapah hii tama rodan, gaga yqeyaq, tara meyah sapah.
english: Your grandfather is not at home. He's in the field. Wait for him to come back.

trv: Bsiyaq ini bqita, bbaro hnyegan so di.
english: I haven't seen you in a while. You've grown taller.
It's so good to see you.

trv: Biqon yamo spoto nii, psai kolo hoda.
english: Here's a pineapple for you. Put it in the refrigerator.

trv: Bsiyaq namo ini eyah, ga mo plawa meyah mekan ido hini kana.
english: It's been a while. Let's have a meal together.

trv: Iya mmiyaq di, ini howa mimah ko ocya, theyaq ta ceka dheran.
english: No need to bother. I'll just have tea. Let's sit in the living room and chat.

trv: Mhowe so knmalo bale, maha ko di.
english: Thank you for your hospitality. I have to go now.

trv: Hani snnipaq rodox nii, desi naq tghowe mekan iso.
english: This chicken was just freshly killed. Take it home and enjoy it slowly.

trv: Psterong ta koson bobo mnekan ho?
english: Can I make an appointment with you tomorrow afternoon?

trv: Malo ma, psterong ta so ino?
Mowa psterong ta sapah pyasan? Psasing ta.
english: How about meeting at school? We need to shoot a video.

trv: Nita ssliyan seediq hiya, mplokos ko lokos seediq mosa.
english: Then let's go to the community center. I'll wear folk costume.

trv: Malo qtaan snegi alang nami, Mphepah de eyah skadi yako.
english: The cherry blossoms in our tribe are beautiful when they bloom. Come find me when the flowers bloom!

trv: Ptara dehok mprbagan tena tghowe di.
english: That would have to wait until spring. It's too late, isn't it?
Alright! I'm looking forward to it!

trv: Malox so maha meniq alang di?
english: May I ask why you decided to move back to the tribe?
I want to return to teach at the local school.

trv: Malox so ini tgesa alang paro?
english: Why not teach in the city?

trv: Ado ko lmngelon alang mo, niqal lnlongan mo dmayo alang.
english: Because I miss my hometown and I also want to give back to the tribe.

trv: Mkela so riyong tminon, ima tngesa iso?
english: You're very skilled at weaving, who taught you?

trv: Heya mkela riyong tminon alang miyan, bobo mo rodan.
english: It was my grandmother, she is the most skilled weaver in our tribe.
How did you develop an interest in learning weaving?

trv: Mkpslotoc Gaya miyan, tminon ka Gaya nami.
english: Weaving is a part of our culture, and I want to ensure its continuity.

trv: Malo mahon ka sino bale nii.
Keyan so knkela, ye bisyaq ba msino sino?
english: You're really talented. Does it take a long time to make?

trv: Ini, maha hari mpito ali. Prayon ka ido dheqoy ma ido gmaxon tamon, psaon liwas deno.
english: No, it only takes about a week. After steaming the sticky rice and white rice, we mix it with yeast powder, and then it can be stored in a jar.

trv: Niqal ko ocik ma qocon, pnhmaan mo naq yako kana!
english: I have chili and lokiy, both grown by myself!

trv: Koxol mo lokos nii,, piya pila?
english: I like this piece of clothing. How much is it?
It's too expensive. Can't you lower the price a bit?

trv: Uxe, maha oka stnkeyan mo ka yako.
english: No, if I lower it further, I'll lose money.

trv: Un! Kiya mangal ko kingal lokos qalox.
english: Alright then, I'll take a black piece of clothing.

trv: Moko ko niqal yayo ma ribo nii.
english: I want this knife and this pot.

trv: Mposan kbekoy pila kana, maha bsiyaq ddooyon, slmeyan mo baga mo naq yako.
english: It's a total of 2000 dollars. I handmade these, and they are guaranteed to last a long time.

trv: Mowa mhenok hari brigan, tngsaan ko na dangi mo meyah mari?
english: I'll introduce my friend to buy. Can you give a further discount?
Alright! I'll give you a 20% discount.

trv: Niqal gmbari bonoh lokos, eyah qmita!
english: Come and take a look! We sell clothes and hats.

trv: Kingal lokos tero kbekoy mriman pila, tero de maxal kbekoy pila.
english: One piece of clothing is 350 dollars, three pieces for 1000 dollars.

trv: Mari ko kingal, biqi ko bgorah na.
english: I'll just buy one piece, please give me a new one.

trv: Malo so, mkmari ko ido dheqoy ma siyang mao.
english: Hello, I would like to buy sticky rice and braised pork with maqaw pepper.

trv: Mhedo ko gmbari ido di, niqal hlama sangas, mari so?
english: The rice is sold out. I have tana pancakes, would you like to buy them?

trv: Un, biqi ko kingal, bobo de meyah ko mari ido.
english: Alright, please give me one. I'll come back next time to buy rice.

trv: Un, lobowan mo loboy mriman pila kana.
english: Okay, I'll pack it in a bag for you. That'll be 50 dollars.

trv: Kana ita mnswayi, prajing ta da.
Kana laqi,. jiyax sayang ptgsa ko monan shoya rmngaw kari Seejiq ka ooqon.
english: Hello everyone. Today I am going to teach you how to say food in Sederik.

trv: Klaon namo qmbahang kari emptgsa hog?
english: Do you understand what the teacher says?

trv: Emptgsa, ini mo klai qmbahang. Tdowa so emkingal rmngaw dori hog?
english: I don't understand. Can you repeat it again?

trv: Ini mo qbhangi, kparo hari ka hnang so hog?
english: I can't hear you, can you speak louder?

trv: Qita hini! Porog knan txal dori.
english: Look here, please! Repeat after me.

trv: Kiya! Malo balay ka snpog so.
english: Yes! You read that very well.

trv: Spog txal dori Kparo hari ka hnang.
english: Read it again. Please speak louder.

trv: Emptgsa, wada ko smhongi madas ppatas da.
english: I forgot to bring my pen.

trv: Emptgsa, wada ko smhongi madas ssros da.
english: I forgot to bring my eraser.

trv: Kbarox ssros siyaw thiyan so smlohay.
english: Please borrow erasers from your classmates.

trv: Dhoq hini ka slhayan ta han, strong ta babaw dori.
english: Class dismissed, see you next time.

trv: Laqi ko Basaw ka yako. Pisaw ka hangan mo.
english: I am the son of Basaw, and my name is Pisaw.

trv: Emptgsa mo ka Basaw Pisaw ka hangan mo.
english: I am a student in Basaw, my name is Pisaw.

trv: Mano ka hangan tama so hog?
Qbsoran mo snaw ka hiya. Koras ka hangan na.
english: He's my brother, his name is Kuras.

trv: Ipay ka hiya. Swayi bobo mo qrijil ka hiya. Nirih mo bobo ka hiya.
Dangi mo ka hiya. Lobi ka hangan niya.
english: She's a friend of mine and her name is Lubi.

trv: Piya hngkwasan niya ka tama so hog?

english: How many brothers and sisters do you have?

trv: Niqan dha ka qbsoran mo, kingal ka swayi mo.
english: I have two brothers and sisters and one younger brother and sister.

trv: Niqan piya hiyi ka tnsapah namo hog?
english: How many people are in your family?

trv: Niqan spac hiyi ka tnsapah nami.
english: There are four of us in our family.

trv: Gaga so meoyas patas ino hog?
Ya embiyax ka tama so ni bobo so hog?
Msblaiq ni embiyax bi ka tama ni bobo, mhoway so!
english: Mom and Dad are safe and healthy, thank you!

trv: Gaga qmpah mano ka mnswayi snaw bobo so hog?
english: What does your uncle do for a living?

trv: Niqan qpahon na ka qbsoran so qrijil hog?
english: Does your sister have a job?

trv: Gaga qmpah sapah spohan ka hiya hog?
Tnposo so seejiq ka iso hog?
Iq! Seejiq ko balay ka yako.
Tnposo seejiq ka dongos so hog?
Iq! Bowqax kana ka tnsapah mo.
english: Yes, we are all very tall.

trv: Wada meoyas sapah pyasan ka swayi so qrijil dhog?
english: Does your sister go to school?

trv: Iq! Wada meoyas sapah pyasan ka hiya.
Mkla rmngaw kari Seejiq ka swayi so hog?
english: Do your siblings speak the language?

trv: Iq! Mkla rmngaw kari Seejiq ka dhiya.
english: Yes, they speak the ethnic language.
I have three brothers and sisters.

trv: Tohoy so mniq tama ni bobo hog?
english: Do you live with your parents?

trv: Iq! Tohoy ko mniq tama ni bobo mo.
english: Yes, I live with my mom and dad.

trv: Tohoy so mniq tama rodan ni bobo rodan hog?
english: Do you live with your grandparents?

trv: Ini! Ini ko tohoy mniq dhiya.
english: No, I didn't live with them.

trv: Tohoy ko mniq tama, bobo ni qbsoran mo snaw.
english: I live with my father, mother and brother.

trv: Gaga ino ka sapah namo hog?
Gaga ino ka alang so hog?
Gaga ino ka alang namo hog?

english: When are you going back to the tribe?

trv: Sngayan rbagan ga ida ko mosa alang.
english: I will go back in the summer.

trv: Smriyo ka hidaw do mtalox ka karac da.
english: The sun is coming out, it's very hot.
Is it going to be cold outside?

trv: Mskoy bi, lkosi ego hari lokos.
english: It's cold, so wear more clothes.

trv: Ini! Sbgihor da, mlto ka karac.
Ini ka kskoy ni ini ka kcilox ori, qrason bi.
english: It's neither cold nor hot today, very comfortable.

trv: Ungac rolong ka karac, nii smriyo ka ppngrah da.
english: There were no clouds in the sky; the stars came out.

trv: Msowal sayang bi, smbo ka hidaw do smriyo ka hakaw otox da.
english: The rain has just stopped, the sun has come out, the rainbow is coming out.

trv: Hmoya ka karac namo hiya hog?
english: What's the weather like where you are?
We're going to have a big storm here.

trv: Iso hiya o ya malo ka karac jiyax sayang hog?

english: Very well, out of the big sun.

trv: Mosa ko meoyas sapah pyasan da.
english: I have to go to school.

trv: Mskoy bi ka karac, lkosi ego hari lokos.
english: The weather is very cold, so wear more clothes.

trv: Pqoyox paro kiya da, iya shongi madas bobong.
english: It's going to rain heavily, you have to remember to bring an umbrella.

trv: Browa da, pqoyox bi kiya da.
english: There was thunder just now, and it's supposed to rain later.

trv: Qmnoyox ka soni, msowal ka sayang da.
english: It just rained, and now it's stopped.

trv: Mhoriq ka elog, saw bi qmnoyox da.
english: It seems to have rained and the road is wet.

trv: Qmoyox hog? Ma mhoriq kana ka lokos so?
english: Is it raining? Why are you all wet?

trv: Gaga qmoyox ka ngangoc, ini ko adas bobong.
english: It's raining outside, so I didn't bring an umbrella.

trv: Sbgihor paro, mako mnarox ka tonox mo.
english: The wind is blowing so hard that my head hurts.

trv: Smbo paro hidaw mako tkoni ka tonox mo.
english: The sun is so big, it makes me dizzy.
I forgot to bring my pen.
You can borrow this one first!
I forgot to bring my chopsticks.

trv: Ini ko adas ka yako ori, emta marig hog?
english: I don't have one either, let's go buy one.
Let's go buy a pen, shall we?
Well, I still have to buy erasers.
Let's go get breakfast, shall we?

trv: Uxay ko! Mnkan ko sapah da.
english: I don't want it, I ate it at home.
I forgot to steam my lunchbox.
I forgot to bring my lunchbox.

trv: Sopo ta mkan hndayo mo ha!
english: Then let's eat my lunch box together!

trv: Mkan so mano ska hidaw hog?
english: What are you having for lunch?

trv: Peekan ko hnapoy sapah pyasan ska hidaw.
english: I want a nutritious school lunch.

trv: Hndayo ko ka jiyax sayang, sopo ta mkan hndayo mo ha!
english: I've brought a lunchbox today, let's eat together at noon!
Let's go play basketball, shall we?
I don't want it, I want to study.
Can you help me with the broom?

trv: Jyagi ko mangal galiq ssros hog?
english: Can you help me with the cloth?

trv: Gaga ko smsik dxgal, lawa Siray dmayaw sonan hog?
english: I'm sweeping the floor, you ask Siray to help you.

trv: Mrociq bi ka babaw oqan, sai smros han.
english: The table is dirty, go wipe it.
Okay, I'll go get the cloth.

trv: Mrociq bi ka bling gagi gaga, sai smros han.
english: That window is very dirty, go clean it.

trv: Iya han, ini mo qhdoi smsik ka hini na.
english: Wait a minute, I'm not done sweeping here yet.
I'm going to see my teacher.

trv: Phoya so malax meoyas patas kiya da?
english: What do you do after school?

trv: Tohoy ko dangi mosa meoyas oyas.
english: I'm going to sing with my friends.

trv: Phoya malax meoyas patas kiya ka hiya da?
english: What does he do after school?
He said he was going swimming.

trv: Gaga sapah ka hiya, agoh mtmay sapah.
english: She's at home, please come in.

trv: Ungac hini ka hiya, phoya so hog?
english: She's not here, what can I do for you?

trv: Tama rodan, Bakan ko rwahi ka rhngon!
english: Grandpa, this is Bakan, please open the door.

trv: Komo, Away ko, miyah ko tohoy sonan.
english: Kumu, I'm Away, I've come to play with you.
(I've been with everyone) Long time no see.

trv: Iq! Lnglongon balay. Agoh tohoy ha!
english: Yeah! I miss you so much. Come on, let's chat!
sit down, have tea first (intonation indicates sincerity).
Come on! Please have tea (come and have tea)

trv: Tagay knmalo mahon ka ocya namo.
Wah! Tagay knmalo qtaan ka hiyi qhoni nii.
Malo oqon ka hiyi qhoni hog?
Mnhdo mhapoy damac keeman ka bobo da, agoh mkan nhari.
english: Mom has cooked dinner, come and eat!

trv: Iq wa! Mosa ko trima baga han.
english: Okay, I'll go wash my hands.
Try to eat and drink as much as possible, we are family.

trv: Ego bi ka wada mo oqon mtngi ko bi da.
english: I ate a lot, I'm full.

trv: Mosa ko da, strong ta babaw dori.
english: I'm leaving, I'll see you next time.

trv: Keeman da, mosa ko sapah da.
Ena! Niqan jiyax so o agoh tohoy sapah.
english: Okay, come to my house sometime.

trv: Kana lqlaqi, mosa ta qmita rodan alang ka jiyax sayang.
english: Kids, today we're going to visit the elders in the tribe!

trv: Wa, malo wah! Asi ta ka skari kari Seejiq wah!
english: Yes! We're going to talk to the seniors in Sederic.

trv: Akay balay! Ma namo mkla rmngaw kari Seejiq! Malo balay wah!
Kana lqlaqi, mosa ta qmpah knpahan maso ka jiyax sayang.
english: Kids, today we're going to work in Little Rice Fields.

trv: Agoh hini kana, adas qyqaya namo ni kngkingal miyah.
english: Come, everyone, bring your tools one by one.

trv: Iq wah! Emptgsa, mnhdo nami mangal qyqaya da.
english: Yes, sir, we've got our tools.
Not yet, it's still far away.
You go get the bird catcher.
Okay, I'll go and catch the birds.

trv: Kana lqlaqi, mosa ta qlangang ssamac ka jiyax sayang.
english: Kids, we are going to the zoo today.

trv: Wa, malo wah! Pshoya ta mosa hog?
english: Awesome! How are we going to get there?

trv: Kngkingal mhiyog psramal ta marig cepyaw.
english: Stand one by one, we are ready to buy tickets.

trv: Brah o qqdoda, bokoy o qqoyo, osa nanaq qmita.
english: There are birds in the front and snakes in the back.

trv: Iya kiisog! saw kiya do osa qmita qdoda ka iso.
english: It doesn't matter, then you go and watch the birds.

trv: Bokoy na kingal patas hidaw do pssli ta hini dori.
english: We'll be back here in an hour.

trv: Mano ka qntaan so jiyax sayang.
Ego bi ka qntaan mo qoyo, ego bi ka qntaan mo qdoda ori.
english: I saw a lot of snakes and a lot of birds.
Hurry up, we have to go.

trv: Tgai ko han, mnarox bi ka qaqay mo.
english: Wait for me, my feet are tired.

trv: Tohoy ta mosa tmapaq qsiya hog?
Hbaraw bi seejiq ka gaga tmapaq qsiya hini.
english: There are a lot of people swimming here.

trv: Mrboq bi ka qsiya hiya, asi ta ttapaq qsiya hini
english: The water is deep there, so we just swim here.
What kind of car did you take?
How do you go to church?

trv: Pgriq rolo ka tama ni sopo nami mosa.
Shoya mosa sapah pyasan kjiyax ka hiya?
english: How does he usually go to school?
He took the subway to school.

trv: Shoya mosa marig damac ka bobo so rodan?
english: How does your grandmother go to the grocery store?
She went to the grocery store on a motorcycle.
How are you going to get to Lantau Island?
I want to take a boat to Lanyu.

trv: Pshoya mosa Ranyotaw ka hiya hog?
english: How did he get to Orchid Island?

trv: Peapa sapah skaya mosa Ranyo ka hiya.
english: He took a plane to Orchid Island.

trv: Peapa rolo mano mosa Kawsyong ka hiya.
english: What bus did he take to Kaohsiung?

trv: Peapa Kawtey mosa Kawsyong ka hiya.
english: He took the THSR to Kaohsiung.

trv: Peapa rolo qrngol mosa Taytong ka hiya hog?
english: Did he take a train to Taitung?

trv: Iq! Peapa rolo qrngol mosa Taytong ka hiya.
english: Yes, he took a train to Taitung.

trv: Uxay wah! Peapa sapah skaya mosa Taytong ka hiya.
english: No, he took a plane to Taitung.

trv: Niqan saan tmaga baso ka kiyig hini hog?
english: Is there a bus stop near here?

trv: Niqan wah! Klelog brah mksa do qtaon so ka saan tmaga baso da.
english: Yes, if you go straight ahead, you will see the bus stop.

trv: Ino ka sdalih bi ceyyoncan hog?
english: Where is the nearest MRT station?

trv: Ungac ceyyoncan ka hini, wana haya ka tdowa ppanon.
english: There is no MRT station here, you can only take a taxi.

trv: Mosa piya patas hidaw ka ppanan baso, kika pdhoq sapah pyasan?
english: How long does it take to get to the school by bus?

trv: 15 spngan do pdhoq sapah pyasan da.
Kndadax Taypey dhoq Taycong o mosa piya patas hidaw hog?
english: How long does it take to take the THSR from Taipei to Taichung?

trv: Kingal patas hidaw do pdhoq Taycong da.
english: I will come to Taichung in an hour.

trv: Kndadax Cirong dhoq Uray o mosa piya patas hidaw hog?
english: Is it a long drive from Keelung to Ulai?

trv: Nasi tloos ka kleelog o yabi mosa hari kingal patas hidaw do pdhoq da.
english: If the road condition is good, it will take about an hour to get there.

trv: Peapa so ceyyon miyah sapah mo o bsiyaq hog?
english: How long did it take you to come to my house by subway?
Do you know how to ride a bicycle?

trv: Iya, ini keego ka klaan mo.
english: Don't, I don't know much about it.

trv: Niqan jiyax so babaw nkan ska hidaw hog? Kmosa ko qmita sonan.
english: Are you free this afternoon? I'd like to visit you, is that okay?
Okay, I'll wait for you at home.

trv: Niqan jiyax so koson hog? Kmosa ko smiling sonan qori kari snroan.
english: Are you free tomorrow? I would like to ask you about the story. *[Amis] Please change to your respective tribe.

trv: Mosa ko dgiyaq daya ka koson, ini ko eniq sapah wah!
english: I'm going to the mountains tomorrow, so I won't be home.

trv: Qnbahang mo o klaon so bi ka endaan rodan Seejiq sbiyaw, mkmsilng ko sonan.
english: I've heard that you're very knowledgeable about the traditional customs of the Secedes and would like to ask you a few questions.

trv: Uxay ego ka klaan mo, ida mo rngagon kana ka klaan.
english: I don't know much, I'll answer with what I know.

trv: Tdowa ko Roing hog? Psklxan mo matas hici.
english: Can I record the video? It will be easier to record in the future.

trv: Mngari kmxalan mspac ka hngkwasan mo da.
Mbiyax ino da, rodan ko da.

english: I come from the Buran tribe.

trv: Seejiq balay ori ka qrijil so hog?
english: Is your wife also a Sedek?

trv: Mkla so rmngaw kari dha hog?
Mkla ko rmngaw kari Troko ni bonon.
Qrason balay ka miyah smiling sonan, rngagi cikoh ka qori Gaya ssaan tmsamac hog?
english: It's a pleasure to interview you today, can you talk about the taboo of hunting?

trv: Iq! Mbiyax ko siida o mosa ko bi lmiqo.
english: Yes. I used to go hunting in the mountains when I was young.

trv: Mhoway so balay, ego balay ka tnegsa so knan jiyax sayang.
english: Thank you, you really guided me a lot today.

trv: Ida balay bi hnici kari rdrodan sbiyaw ka snroan mo nii.
english: All that I say is true, the sayings of my ancestors.

trv: Dhoq hini ka ssiling mo sonan. Mhoway so bi balay.
english: That's all for today's interview. Thank you very much for sharing with us.

trv: Ini hoya! Tdowa ta pprngaw na.
english: It's okay, we can still talk.

trv: Mosa ko han, babaw do mkmqbahang ko ego snro kari na.
english: I'm going to leave now and look forward to hearing more stories next time.

trv: Malo so! Marig so mano hog?
english: Hello, what do you want to buy?
I want to buy a cup.
I want to buy a hat.
I want to buy a cup, do you have one?
Yes, how many do you want to buy?
No, we don't sell betel nut.
How many packs do you want to buy?
I want to buy sweet potatoes.
All the sweet potatoes are sold out.
I want to buy two bottles of oil.
We only have one bottle left.
How many pounds do you want to buy?

trv: Marig so piya tnhjilan balon g?
english: How many pounds of eggs do you want to buy?
I want to buy two catties.
I want to buy two green onions.

trv: Sngari 3 bnkiyan da hini, bqanon miso kana da.
english: There are three left, all for you!

trv: Piya pila ka kingal loboy bowax nii?
english: How much is this bag of rice?

trv: Kana do emposal kingal pila, ana nanaq emposal da.
Marig ko cikoh dori, pkloi 1 kbkoy.
english: I'll buy some more, and make up 100 yuan.

trv: Kana o rima kbkoy maxal pila.
Soqi mkray brigan da, khnok hari hog?
english: It's too expensive, can you make it cheaper?

trv: Uxay kida! Ida wada mhnok brigan da.
english: No, this is already very cheap.
I want this packet of cookies.

trv: Mrimal ka emo nii, marig so mmano na hog?
english: $30 for the cookies, anything else you need?
Can you lend me the money?
Yes! How much do you need?

trv: Wada ko smhongi madas pila da, tdowa ko kmbarox pila so hog?
english: I forgot to bring money, can I borrow money from you?
I don't have any money either!

trv: Uxay, ini so bqani knan ka knbrxan so na.
english: No, you haven't paid me back the money you borrowed last time.

trv: Tdowa ko kmbarox lokos so hog?
Tdowa ko kmbarox patas so hog?
Kbrxi knan ka ddeynsya so hog?
Iq! Asi so ka yahon mhadoc koson.
english: Okay, you have to return it tomorrow!

trv: Qmoyox da, ini ko adas bobong, kbrxi ko bobong hog?
english: It's raining, I don't have an umbrella, can you lend me your umbrella?

trv: Kingal balay ka bobong mo, sopo ta mobong hog?
english: I only have an umbrella, let's stick together!

trv: Knbrxan so knan sndoray ka patas nii, bqanon miso da.
english: This is the book you borrowed from me last time, I give it back to you.

trv: Mqmita so meeno patas o rngagi ko.
english: Tell me what else you want to read.
When do I have to pay you back?

trv: Ini hoya! Mdooy so do bqani ko da.
english: It doesn't matter, you can talk about it when you have money.

trv: Bqanon so knan knowan ka knbrxan so pila da?
english: When are you going to pay me back?
I'll return it to you tomorrow. /I'll send it tomorrow.

trv: Bqanon so knan knowan ka knbrxan so patas da?
english: When are you going to return my book?
I paid you back yesterday, didn't I? /I gave it back to you yesterday, didn't I?

trv: Koras ka knbarox sonan ppatas nii hog?
english: Did Kuras lend you this pen?

trv: Iq! Knbrxan mo hiya jiyax sayang.
english: Yes, I borrowed it from him today.

trv: Knbrxan so Koras ka ppatas nii hog?
english: Did you borrow this pen from Kuras?
No, this is what mom bought.

trv: Ungac da cimo, osa kmbarox cikoh cimo Pitay.
english: We are out of salt, let's borrow some from Pitay.

trv: Sai rmngaw ka Pitay, hadoc ka pila knbrxan so ksa.
english: Go and ask Pitay to pay me back.
How much does she owe you?

trv: Mosa ko hmoma sama qnalang ssama.
english: I'm going to plant vegetables in the garden.

trv: Giso ko mabal spriq, syoqon mo qsiya kiya hari da.
english: I'm pulling weeds and will be watering them later.

trv: Adas hini ka soki ni parih hog?
english: Bring your scythes and hoes here, will you?
Put it next to the plow rake.
Did you turn over the soil?

trv: Tnbonan mo sayang balay ka dxgal, saon mo smopo kiya da!
english: I just turned over the soil, and so on to sow seeds.

trv: Tdowa ngalan ka hnoma so sama dhog?
english: Are your vegetables ready to be harvested?

trv: Tdowa smqic ka tmana hini da, ini na ka sama watan gaga.
english: The cabbage here is ready to be harvested, but the Showa grass there is not yet ready to be harvested.

trv: Wah! Tagay bi da knarig so banga nii.
english: Wow! You dug up so many gourds.
Will you help me with the barn?
We're releasing fishing nets to catch fish.

trv: Ego bi ka qsorox gaga rowan rawa.
english: We caught a lot of fish in the fish basket.

trv: Shoya so qmraq ka qsorox hog?
english: How do you usually catch fish?

trv: Mdooy ko saho gamil qmraq qsorox.
english: I use poison ivy to catch fish.
Do you know how to hunt with a bow and arrow?

trv: Powsa ko gasil seangal mo ssamac, mnsowil ko madas poniq pholing ori.
english: I usually use traps to get my prey, but occasionally I hunt with a gun and a dog.
This is the road the boar took.

trv: Dapil bowyak ka nii, kiya ni elog bowyak ka hini.
english: These are the footprints of the boar, so this is the path the boar took.

trv: Sai nhari qmita ka gasil ta, saw bi wada tjiyal samac da.
english: Go and see our trap, for it seems that we have caught our prey.

trv: Saw bi wada smknox ka holing da, saay ta nhari smnegol.
english: The dog seems to have smelled it. Let's follow them.
This is a stone trap, used to catch rats.

trv: Mano ka gaga so psaan hiya?
english: What is that thing you put there?

trv: Gasil ka gaga, sqraq nami pada.
english: It was a leg-rigged rope trap, and we used it to catch Shankiang.

trv: Malo balay otox nami, ego bi ka nangal nami jiyax sayang.
english: Thanks to the blessing of our ancestors, we had a great harvest today.

trv: Kiya hmi! Dson nami alang ni seasog mkan knealang.
english: Yeah! Let's take it back to the tribe and share it!

trv: Jiyax sayang emptgsa ga ptgsa monan shoya rmngaw kari seejiq ka ssamac.
english: I will teach everyone all kinds of animals in 3S3T language today.

trv: Jiyax sayang emptgsa ga ptgsa monan shoya rmngaw kari seejiq ka hiyi qhoni.
english: I will teach everyone all kinds of fruits in 3S3T language today.
Teacher, I didn't bring my textbook.
Share the book with your classmate next to you.
I will lend you my eraser.

trv: Malax nami meoyas patas da, qlahang balay mksa elog.
english: It is the end of the class, be careful on your way home.

trv: Iq wa! Mhoway so balay emptgsa.
Malax nami meoyas patas da, swayay ta han.
english: The class is over, goodbye everyone.

trv: Embiyax namo kana hog? Hangan mo o Litok.
english: Hello everyone, my name is Lituk.

trv: Embiyax namo kana hog? Hangan mo o Lobi.
english: Hello everyone, my name is Lubi.

trv: Embiyax so hog? Yako o Bakan.
Embiyax so hog? Bakan. Yako o Pawan.
Embiyax so hog? Yako o Apay.
Embiyax so hog? Apay. Yako o Walis.
Bobo ko Ukan, Yako o Ubing.
Swayi ko qrijil Basaw ka yako, hangan mo o Aking.
english: I am Basaw's sister. My name is Aking.

trv: Emptgsa mo ka hiya, hangan na o Koras.
Qbsoran mo snaw ka hiya, Pering ka hangan niya.
Mano ka hangan qbsoran so qrijil hog?
english: What is your elder sister's name?

trv: Pitay ka hangan qbsoran mo qrijil.
english: My elder sister's name is Pitay.

trv: Mano ka hangan swayi so qrijil hog?
english: What is your younger sister's name?

trv: Ubing ka hangan swayi mo qrijil.
english: My younger sister's name is Ubing.

trv: Klaon so ima ka hangan na hog?
Piya hngkwasan ka qbsoran so snaw hog?
english: How old is your elder brother?

trv: Maxal rima ka hngkwasan na da.
Piya hngkwasan ka swayi so snaw hog?
english: How old is your younger brother?

trv: Niqan sapah pyasan ka alang namo hog?
english: Do you have schools in your community?

trv: Ga so meoyas patas sapah pyasan alang ka iso hog?
english: Do you study in your tribe's school?

trv: Iq! Saw nami kingal tnsapah ka meoyas patas sapah pyasan.
english: Yes, we are like family while we are studying at school.

trv: Gaga qmpah mano ka bobo so hog?
Gaga qmpah mano ka tama so hog?
Swayi so snaw ka hiya hog?
Uxay! Dangi swayi mo snaw ka hiya.
english: No, he is my younger brother's friend.

trv: Qbsoran so qrijil ka hiya hog?
Uxay! Swayi mo qrijil ka hiya.
english: No, she is my younger sister.

trv: Piya hiyi ka tnsapah dha hog?
english: How many people in their family?

trv: Niqan rima hiyi ka tnsapah dha.
english: There are five people in their family.
How many children in your family?

trv: Kana o spac ka laqi nami.
english: There are four children in our family.
How many younger siblings do you have?

trv: Ungac ko swayi snaw, niqan tro ka swayi qrijil.
english: I don't have any younger brothers, but I have three younger sisters.
How many older siblings do you have?
I don't have any older siblings.
How many siblings do you have?

trv: Mnswayi namo snaw ka yamo hog?
Iq! Qbsoran mo snaw ka hiya.
Tnposo namo seejiq ka yamo hog?
Iq! Tnposo nami seejiq ka yami.
Seejiq Balay ori ka hiya hog?
Iq! Seejiq Balay ori ka hiya.
Hmoya ka karac jiyax sayang hog?
Mtalox hari ka karac, imah ego hari qsiya.
english: It's a bit hot, so you need to drink more water.

trv: Paro balay ka hidaw, iya soqi thidaw.
english: The sun is bright and remember to wear sunscreen.

trv: Ego bi ka rolong, ongac qtaan karac ka hidaw.
english: There are a lot of clouds but no sun in the sky.

trv: Peongac hidaw ka koson, ego bi ka rolong, paro bi ka bgihor.
english: It will be cloudy and windy but not sunny tomorrow.
How was the weather that day?

trv: Siida o pskoy hari, mosa ngangoc o plkosi wagi.
english: It was a bit cold and you needed to wear a jacket when you went outside.
How's the weather on the weekend?
It will be sunny on the weekend.
Will it be rainy that day?

trv: Siida o mosa malo karac, oxay pqoyox.
english: It will have no rain and be sunny that day.
Yes, it will be rainy that day.

trv: Msowal da! Smriyo ka hidaw da!
english: The rain stops and the sun comes out.

trv: Qmoyox da! Ini ko adas bobong!
english: It is raining and I don't have an umbrella with me.

trv: Ini qoyox ka sayang, babaw nkan do pqoyox da, mosa ngangoc o adas bobong.
english: It is not raining now, but it will be rainy in the afternoon, so you need to bring an umbrella when you go out.
Will it be very cold in winter next year?

trv: Iq! Pskoy balay ka misan hkawas, plkosi ego lokos.
english: Yes, it will be very cold in winter next year, so you need to put on extra layers.

trv: Pktalox bi ka rbagan hngkawas nii hog?
english: Will it be very hot in summer this year?

trv: Iq! Pktalox balay ka rbagan, mahi ego hari qsiya.
english: Yes, it will be very hot and you need to drink more water.

trv: Smkoxol ko karac srnabaw, yasa moxol balay ka karac.
english: I like spring because the weather is warm.

trv: Ini ko skoxol karac krpohan, yasa ego bgihor paro ka karac krpohan.
english: I don't like autumn because there are lots of typhoons in autumn.

trv: Smhongi ko madas slhayan patas da.
english: I forgot to bring the textbook.
I forgot to bring the eraser.
Do you forget to bring your pen?

trv: Iq! Kbrxi ko ppatas so hog?
english: Yes, can you lend me a pen?

trv: Mkan so mano ka ska hidaw hog?
english: What would you like for lunch?

trv: Mkan so mano ka keeman hog?
english: What would you like for dinner?
What did you have for breakfast?
What did you have for lunch?

trv: Usa knama ka iso han, saon so miying kiya hari da.
english: You go first and I will catch up later.

trv: Iya han! Emta thjil patas han.
english: No, we have to carry books first.

trv: Ini na! Giso ko sminaw prato.
english: Not yet. I am doing the dishes.
Did you rinse out your mouth?
Yes, I rinsed out my mouth.
Why didn't you wash your hands?
What were you doing just now?
I went to meet the teacher.

trv: Phoya so malax pyasan kiya dhog?
english: What are you going to do after school?

trv: Phoya malax pyasan kiya ka hiya hog?
english: What is she doing after school?
She is going to go dancing.

trv: Ungac sapah ka Away! Ipay ko ka yako, hmoya hog? Rngagon mo miyah ka Away da.
english: Away is not at home. I am Ipay. What can I do for you? I will let him know when he comes back.

trv: Bobo rodan, Teymo ni Piho nami wa! Jiyagi nami rmawah endok!
english: Grandma, we are Teymu and Pihu, please open the door for us.

trv: Yako o Watan, miyah ko miying Ukan.
english: I am Watan, I am here for Ukan.

trv: Bobo rodan, nii ko miyah qmita sonan da.
english: Grandma, I am here to see you.

trv: Bsiyaq so ini iyah da, lnglongon miso balay.
english: You haven't been here for a long time. I missed you so much.

trv: Away, nii ko miyah miying sonan hmrapas da.
english: Away, I am here to play with you.

trv: Agoh mtmay nhari, bsiyaq ko tmaga sonan da.
english: Come on in! I have been waiting for you for a long time.

trv: Hnoma mo ka bonga nii, oqi binaw!
english: This is the sweet potato I grow. Try it!

trv: Shiya bi oqan ka bonga nii.
english: The sweet potato is so sweet.

trv: Agoh! Hnoma mo ka hiyi qhoni nii, oqi binaw!
english: Come here! These are the fruits I grow. You should try it.

trv: Ssibos bi ka hiyi qhoni nii.
Tloong! Hnoma mo ka sqmo nii, oqi binaw!
english: Take a seat! You should try some organic corn that I grow.

trv: Waw! Ssibos oqon ka sqmo nii.
english: Wow! The corn tastes so sweet.

trv: Naqih mo ka mkan modo, mkan ko pingkwo do kiya da.
english: I can't eat oranges. I will have some apples instead.
Sure, I like it very much.

trv: Qmilis ko hiyi qhoni oqon so.
english: Let me peel the fruit for you.

trv: Mhoway so! Ego bi biyoq niya ka hiyi qhoni nii.
english: Thank you. This fruit is so juicy.
I will bring you some water.

trv: Uqi ego hari, ego ka hnangoc mo damac.
english: Enjoy yourself. I cooked a lot of dishes.

trv: Waw! Malo sknxan ni malo oqon ori.
english: Oh! It smells good and looks delicious.

trv: Uqi ego hari, niqan ego na hini.
english: Enjoy yourself. There is a lot more.
I'll make myself at home then.

trv: Uqi ego hari, niqan ego na hini.
english: Enjoy yourself. There are plenty here.

trv: Ego da nkan mo, oxay ko mkan da.
english: I ate a lot and couldn't eat any more.

trv: Jiyax sayang madas monan mosa dgiyaq daya ka emptgsa.
english: I will take you to the mountains today.

trv: Ego bi preykaw ka dgiyaq daya msa ka bobo.
english: Mom says that there are lots of mosquitoes in the mountains.

trv: Jiyax sayang madas monan mosa qnpahan ka emptgsa.
english: I will take you to the fields.
Are we going to loosen the soil?

trv: Mosa ta ino ka jiyax sayang hog?
Madas mnan mosa siyaw yayong ka emptgsa.
english: Teacher will take us to the riverside.

trv: Madas mnan mosa dgiyaq daya ka emptgsa.
english: Teacher will take us to the mountains today.

trv: Mosa ta siyaw yayong ka jiyax sayang hog?
english: Are we going to the riverside today?

trv: Uxay! Madas mnan mosa dgiyaq daya ka emptgsa.
english: No, our teacher is going to take us to the mountains.

trv: Mosa ta dgiyaq daya ka jiyax sayang hog?
english: Are we going to the mountains today?

trv: Uxay! Mosa ta qpahan ka jiyax sayang.
english: No, we are going to the fields.

trv: Emptgsa, Mosa ta qmita mano siyaw yayong?
english: Teacher, what are we going to see at the riverside?
We are going to see dragonflies.

trv: Emptgsa Mosa ta qmita mano dgiyaq daya?
english: Teacher, what are we going to see in the mountains?
We are going to see butterflies.
What are we going to do in the fields?

trv: Mosa ta qmita hnoma ta sqmo, niqan qtahi, walo qlahang hari.
english: We are going to see the corn we grow in the fields, but you need to be aware of the ants and bees.

trv: Emptgsa, mosa ta tmapaq qsiya yayong hog?
english: Teacher, are we going to swim in the river?
No, we are going to see dragonflies.

trv: Emptgsa, mosa ta hmoma sama qnpahan hog?
english: Teacher, are we going to grow some vegetables in the fields?
We are going to loosen the soil today.

trv: Niqan ciyadan ka gaga skkaya hiya.
Jiyax sayang qolong mo qtaan ka meodos na ciyadan.
english: Today is the first time I see real living dragonflies.

trv: Yey! Wa! Smkoxol ko klalay, malo qtaan.
english: Yeh! Wow! I love butterflies. They are very beautiful.

trv: Uxay klalay ka gaga, Walo ka gaga.
english: Those are not butterflies. They are bees.

trv: Qita hini binaw! Iya osa dhiyaq balay wa!
english: Come here and take a look. Don't go too far!
Got it, we won't go anywhere too far.

trv: Iya ttalang! Thoway mksa ptakor so da.
english: Don't run and walk slowly lest you fall down.
I want to see them right away.
How do you go to the block-house?

trv: Shoya mosa sapah spohan ka hiya?
english: How does he go to the hospital?

trv: Mksa mosa sapah spohan ka hiya.

english: How do you go to Penghu?

trv: Teapa ko sapah skaya mosa Pongho.
english: I go to Penghu by plane.
How do you go to Penghu?
I go to Penghu by boat.

trv: Teapa mano mosa sapah pyasan ka Litok hog?
english: How does Lituk go to school?

trv: Teapa rolo qrngol mosa sapah pyasan ka Litok.
english: Lituk goes to school by train.

trv: Teapa mano mosa pnrholan ka Basaw hog?
english: How does Basaw go to church?

trv: Teapa ddeynsya mosa pnrholan ka Basaw.
english: Basaw goes to church by bicycle.

trv: Teapa so ceyyon mosa sapah pyasan hog?
english: Do you go to school by MRT?

trv: Uxay! Teapa ko baso mosa sapah pyasan.
english: No, I go to school by bus.

trv: Teapa so ddeynsya mosa sapah pyasan hog?
english: Do you go to school by bicycle?

trv: Iq! Teapa ko ddeynsya mosa sapah pyasan.
english: Yes, I go to school by bicycle.

trv: Teapa so kawtey mosa Kaw-syong hog?
english: Do you go to Kaohsiung by High Speed Rail?

trv: Iq! Teapa ko kawtey mosa Kawsyong.
english: Yes, I go to Kaohsiung by High Speed Rail.

trv: Mosa so Tay-tong o teapa so rolo qrngol? Ya so teapa sapah skaya?
english: Are you going to Taitung by train or by plane?

trv: Teapa ko sapah skaya, ida ini biyaw ka sapah skaya dha ka rolo qrngol.
english: I will take the plane because it is faster than the train.

trv: Mosa so pnrholan o teapa so baso? Ya so mgriq rolo?
english: Are you going to drive to the church or take the bus?

trv: Pgriq ko rolo mosa pnrholan, ida blayiq kiya mgriq rolo dha ka teapa baso.
english: I will drive to the church because it is more convenient than the bus.

trv: Sdalih caw-s ka sapah namo hog?
english: Is the market close to your house?

trv: Uxay ka sdalih, ida ko teapa otobay mosa caw-s.
english: No, it is not, so I always ride the motorcycle to the market.

trv: Sdalih yow-cyo ka sapah pyasan hog?
english: Is the post office close to the school?

trv: Sdalih bi! Mksa do dhoq da.
english: Yes, it is within walking distance.

trv: Sdalih tgaan rolo ka sapah oqan hog?
english: Is the restaurant close to the station?

trv: Miyah ngangoc sapah tgaan rolo mksa 5 spngan do kika dhoq da.
english: It only takes five minutes after you walk out of the station.

trv: Niqan so jiyax ka sayang hog?

english: I would like to visit you.

trv: Niqan ddaon mo ka jiyax sayang. Babaw dhog?
english: I am out today. How about another day?

trv: Niqan so jiyax ka koson hog? Mosa ko miying sonan babaw nkan.
english: Then, are you available tomorrow? I'll visit you tomorrow afternoon.
Sure, I will wait for you at home.

trv: Tdowa ko hmroc hnang so hog? Shici mo hici.
english: Would you mind if I do the voice recording? I would like to keep a record.
Would you mind if I do the video recording?

trv: Iya! Naqih ko qtaan, ini kragi ka rpon ori.
english: No, I am plain and the warehouse hasn't been tidied up yet.
Then I will just take photos.
Thank you for accepting the interview.
You are welcome. What would you like to know?

trv: Mbbiyax so siida o qnpah so mano hog?
english: What do you do when you are young?

trv: Keysaco ko ka seoxal han, wada ko malax da.
english: I was a police officer but I am retired now.

trv: Mano ka gaga so qpahon sayang?
english: Then, are you working at the moment?

trv: Ga mniq alang ori ka laqi so hog?
english: Do your kids live in the tribe too?

trv: Ini! Ga mniq alang breenox ka laqi mo.
english: No, my kids are all living in the city.

trv: Iso nanaq ka ga mniq sapah hog?
english: Then, do you live by yourself?

trv: Giso ko tmabog kingal holing ni kingal qdoda, ida tnsapah mo ori ka dhiya.
english: I also keep a dog and a bird. They are my family.

trv: Giso ko Tmabog kingal ngiyaw ori, niqan tbogon lmhaw knan.
english: I have a cat too. I won't get bored with the company of my pet.

trv: Mkmsiling ko sonan qori Gaya tmsamac.
english: I would like to ask you about the taboos of hunting.

trv: Uxay ego ka klaon mo, ida mo syokon kana ka klaan mo.
english: I don't know much about that, but I will tell you everything I know.

trv: Qyqaya namo tmsamac o mgaya mano hog?
english: Do you have any taboos about hunting weapons?

trv: Qyqaya nami tmsamac o ini ptlngi dqrijil.
english: Our hunting weapons are untouchable to women.

trv: Ya tdowa tohoy mosa tmsamac ka qrijil gaga hog?
english: Then, can women go hunting together?

trv: Uxay kida! Ini tdowa tmsamac ka dqrijil.
english: No, women cannot go hunting either.

trv: Koras, ongac da sinaw sapah, osa marig sinaw.
english: Kuras, our home is out of rice wine, please go and buy some.

trv: Niqan kingal tasaw na hpoyan, iya barig han!
english: There is still one bottle left in the kitchen, so there is no need to buy one!

trv: Uxay baka ka kingal tasaw, osa marig dha tasaw dongan.
english: One bottle is not enough for me, go and buy two more back.

trv: Marig ko sinaw, niqan namo sinaw sbarig hog?
english: I am looking for rice wine. Do you have any rice wine?
Yes! How many bottles do you need?

trv: Marig ko dha tasaw, marig ko kingal loboy bowax ori.
english: I want two bottles and a pack of rice.

trv: Nii ka bowax, marig so mano na hog?
english: Here is the rice, what else do you need?

trv: Marig ko balong na, niqan namo hog?
english: I want some eggs too, do you have some?

trv: Wada brigan kana da balong nami.

english: I want to buy some clothes.
What kind of clothes do you like?
I want to buy the clothes with short sleeves.

trv: Niqan ka ini ktna na rakaw?
Niqan nami embhgay ni mgkarac na.
english: We have white and blue ones too.

trv: Biqi ko kingal lokos mgkanac na.
english: Please give me the clothes in blue.

trv: Koras, mnosa so ino ka sayang balay hog? Mnosa so yon-tong hog?
english: Kuras, where have you been just now? Did you go exercising?

trv: Ini! Mnosa ko dmayaw marig damac bobo rodan.
english: No, I went grocery shopping for my grandma.

trv: Kiya? Niqan jiyax so keeman? Agoh seopo knan mkan nhapoy hog?
english: No wonder! Are you available at night? Would you like to have a meal with me?
No, I want to buy some clothes.
Then, I will go with you.

trv: Embiyax so hog? Piya pila ka bnkiyan sama nii?
english: Hello, how much is this bunch of vegetables?
The vegetables are $20 for a bunch.
Sweet potatoes are thirty dollars for a pound.

trv: Biqi ko dha bnkiyan sama ni kingal tay-cin bonga.
english: Please give me two bunches of vegetables and a pound of sweet potatoes.

trv: Basaw, wada ko smhongi madas ppatas da, tdowa so kbarox knan hog?
english: Basaw, I forgot to bring my pen. Can you lend me one?

trv: Ini ko adas ori, nPitay ka nii.
english: I don't have one either. This is Pitay's.

trv: Kbrxon mo han hog? Uxay mo biyaw hadon?
english: Can you lend me the pen for a second? I will return to you immediately.

trv: Mhoway so! Jiyagi ko rmngaw mhoway so ksa ka Pitay ori ha.
english: Thank you and thank Pitay for me.

trv: Miyah ko mhadoc dha patas nii.
english: I want to return these two books.
No problem and what else do you need?

trv: Pkbarox ko tro patas nii na.
english: I would like to borrow these three books.

trv: Kiya da! Iya shngii ktro jiyax do haji dori.
english: Sure and remember to return them after three days.

trv: Ini so bqani knan ka knbrxan so ssros na.
english: You haven't returned me the eraser.

trv: Ma ongac qtaan ka ssros mo da.
english: Then, why is my eraser missing?

trv: Ya so wada kbrxon Basaw da.
english: Did you lend it to Basaw?

trv: Ini ko kla. Saon mo smiling binaw.
english: I don't know. I will go and ask her.

trv: Kbrxi iso ka ssros mo han.
english: I will lend you my eraser first.

trv: Pitay, ya Basaw ka knbarox sonan wagi nii?
english: Pitay, did Basaw lend you this coat?

trv: Uxay! Bnarig bobo mo sbgay na knan ka nii.
english: No, my mom bought it for me.

trv: Mtna qtaan ka wagi Basaw nii.
english: Basaw 's coat is the same as yours.

trv: Mqalox ka wagi niya, ini ktna ka rakaw nami.
english: His coat is black, so our colors are different.

trv: Pitay, knbarox so pila Basaw hog?
english: Pitay, did you borrow money from Basaw?

trv: Iq! Iyox mo bqanon jiyax sayang, wada ko smhongi madas pila da.
english: Yes, I was supposed to return to him today, but I forgot to bring the money.

trv: Saw kiya do bqanon so knowan da?
english: Then, when will you return the money?
I will return to him tomorrow.

trv: Ena! Jiyagon miso rmngaw ka Basaw.
english: Okay, I will tell Basaw for you.

trv: Mdooy dangar kika qmraq qowlic, mdooy dorang kika qmraq tkorih, asi ka saw kiya.
english: It is correct to catch mice through rangay and catch bamboo partridges through qjiulang.

trv: Han! Kla saw kiya, wada mo tgqoan da! Kla saw kiya ini ko qraq.
english: No wonder! I am mistaken and that's why I cannot catch any of them.

trv: Tgsaon miso shoya smalo ka dangar ni dorang dha nii.
english: Then I will teach you how to make two kinds of stone traps and neck rope traps.

trv: Ena! Malo balay! Saw kiya do mpqraq ko samac da.
english: Great! I will be able to catch the prey in the future.

trv: Soqi bbaraw da spriq qpahan, osa mangal soki rpon emta qpahan.
english: The grass in the fields is too tall. Go to the warehouse to take the sickle and let's go to the fields.

trv: Gaga siyaw giya, osa mtmay rowan rpon kika qtaon so da.
english: It is next to the round basket. You will see it when you enter the warehouse.

trv: Qlahang mangal, mhongon balay ka soki.
english: Handle with care, the sickle is very sharp.
My trap is under that tree.

trv: Snkrayan mo ka hini, klaon mo nanaq gaga ino ka dangar mo.
english: I make a mark here, so I know where my trap is.

trv: Qowbo qsorox ka nii, psaon nami siyaw ayog qmraq qsorox.
english: This is a fish trap which we put beside the river for fishing.

trv: Mkla nami mdooy ngahi pngahi qsorox ori wah!
english: We don't have any fish traps there, so we catch fish with a fishing rod.

trv: Ini ko dooy bhniq ngahi na tgsai ko babaw dhog?
english: I have never used a fishing rod before, would you mind teaching me next time?

trv: Ena! Sopo ta mosa pngahi babaw da.
english: Sure! Let's go fishing together next time.

trv: Tgsaon miso smalo qowbo qsorox babaw da.
english: I will teach you how to make a fish trap next time.

trv: Ga lglog da bhniq ngahi so, ya bi tdaong da qsorox! bbili nhari.
english: Your fishing rod is moving. Isn't the fish on the hook? Pull it up!

trv: Iya han! Soqi lglog da aso. Blbil ko ngahi hini ka yako, osa hiya ni jiyagi ko mangal kaji.
english: Wait, the ship is rolling heavily. I am here to pull the fishing rod and you should go there to grab me the net.

trv: Bbili knan hini ka qsorox, jiyagon miso bmbil.
english: Pull the fish to my side and I will help you pull it up.

trv: Malo balay wah! Ego balay ka nangal jiyax sayang, mako thngay kana ka rawa qsorox da.
english: Great! It is a bumper crop today with full fish baskets.

trv: Emta nhari! Sai ta measog dhiya.
english: Let's go back immediately and share it with everyone.

trv: Iya hmrapas da! Nahari tloong babaw tleengan.
english: Stop playing and quickly sit in your seat.

trv: Piya jiyax iyax sngayan ka sayang hog?
Rima jiyax iyax sngayan ka sayang, msangay ka koson, seopo ta mosa rmigaw ngangoc haw!
english: It's Friday today, we have a day off tomorrow. Let's go out and play together!
Great! Let's go to the riverside.

trv: Piya jiyax iyax sngayan ka koson hog?
english: What day will it be tomorrow?

trv: Tro jiyax iyax sngayan ka koson, mosa ta hmrapas boro babaw ska hidaw ka koson haw!
english: Tomorrow will be Wednesday. Let's go play ball tomorrow afternoon!

trv: Phoya so ka saman koson hog?
english: What will you be doing tomorrow morning?

trv: Jiyax sngayan ka koson, tohoy ko bobo mosa pnrholan.
english: Tomorrow will be Sunday, I will be going to church with my mom.

trv: Kmtbrih ko balay, mosa ko psngangoc.
english: I feel like vomiting. I need to go to the restroom.

trv: Msangay babaw tleengan ka iso han.
Emptgsa, mnarox boyas mo, mosa ko psngangoc.
english: Teacher, I have a stomachache. I need to go to the restroom.

trv: Tdowa ko mosa trima baga hog?
english: May I go wash my hands?

trv: Uxay biyaw malax meoyas patas da, Usa kiya hari dwah!
english: It's almost time for class to end. Wait a little longer.

trv: Emptgsa, mnarox tonox mo, msangay ko ka babaw ska hidaw.
english: It's almost time for class to end. Wait a little longer.

trv: Iq wah! Qlahang hari mosa sapah.
english: Okay, take care and go home.

trv: Emptgsa msangay ko ka babaw kingal jiyax iyax sngayan, mosa ko qmita empsapoh.
english: Teacher, I need to take a sick leave next Monday. I have to see a doctor.

trv: Iq wah! Qlhangi nanaq ka hiyi so.
Mnarox boyas na, ga mniq psngangoc ka hiya.
english: She has a stomachache. She's in the restroom.

trv: Emptgsa, mnarox glo ka Howac, kika msangay ka jiyax sayang.
english: Teacher, Huwac has a sore throat. She took a sick leave today.

trv: Ma ini iyah ka Pitay hog?
Walis Howac ka hangan mo, maxal hngkwasan ka yako sayang.
english: My name is Walis Huwac, and I'm 10 years old.

trv: Meeno klgan seejiq ka iso hog?
english: What ethnic group are you from?

trv: Klgan tnposo seejiq ka kana tnsapah so hog?
english: Are all your family members indigenous?

trv: Iq! Amis kana ka tnsapah mo.
english: Yes, my whole family is Amis.

trv: Klgan tnposo seejiq kana ka tnsapah so hog?
english: Are all your family members indigenous?

trv: Uxay, Amis ka tama mo, klmokan ka bobo mo.
english: No, my father is Amis, and my mother is Han Taiwanese.

trv: Laqi so ima ka iso hog?
Laqi ko Pawan Nomin ka yako.
Tama so ka gaga hog? Piya ka hngkwasan na da?
english: Is that your father? How old is he?

trv: Uxay, rodan alang ta ka hiya, maspac kmxalan ka hngkwasan na da!
english: No, he is an elder of our tribe. He is 80 years old.

trv: Piya hngkwasan ka qbsoran so snaw dhog?
Maxal maspac ka hngkwasan qbsoran snaw mo da.
Rabang paro hngkwasan iso ka qbsoran so snaw hog?
english: Is your brother much older than you?

trv: Rabang paro rima hngkwasan ka qbsoran mo snaw.
Piya snkokoh kmbragan ka bbaraw hnigan so hog?
Kingal kbkoy spatol snkokoh kmbragan ka yako.
Sndamac, ya wada mdakil hnigan so dhog?
english: I haven't seen you in a while. Have you grown taller?

trv: Kiya hmi, Kingal kbkoy mtrol snkokoh kmbragan mo da!
Iq, Mtrol hnjilan mo ka sayang da!
Mosa ko sapah pyasan miying emptgsa.
english: I'm going to the office to see the teacher.

trv: Gaga tmapaq qsiya tpaqan ka hiya, mosa pspong tmapaq qsiya kiya hari ka hiya.
english: He's at the swimming pool. He's going to compete in a swimming competition later.

trv: Gaga ino ka Litok hog? Mosa pspong tmalang kiya hari ka hiya.
english: Where is Lituk? She's going to compete in a running competition later.

trv: Gaga pnrholan ka hiya, mosa ko lmawa hiya.
english: She's in the churches. I'll go call her.
Let's go to the playground together.

trv: Mosa ko marig oqon ska hidaw han, miying ko iso kiya hari da.
english: I'll go buy lunch first, and then I'll meet you later.

trv: Seopo ta mosa mhakol hndayo haw!
english: Let's carry the lunch boxes together!

trv: Usa miying isil seejiq, mosa ko miying emptgsa.
english: You find someone else, I'm going to find the teacher.

trv: Mosa pspong boro jiyax sayang ka Pawan hog?
english: Is Pawan competing in croquet today?

trv: Ini, mosa pspong sbowtaw ka hiya.
english: No, he's competing in high jump.

trv: Mosa so pspong ka jiyax Yon-tong-kay hog?
english: Will you compete in the sports day?

trv: Iq hmi! Mosa ko pspong tmalang.
Phoya ta ka jiyax Yon-tong-kay siida hog?
english: What will we do in the sports day?
We will compete in tug of war.

trv: Brigon ta ooqon ka Yon-tong-kay hog?
english: Will we sell food at the sports day?

trv: Wada so nangal tgkingal biyax pspong so wah, oxay bi sleexan!
english: Congratulations on getting first place! You're amazing!

trv: Gaga mniq sapah ka bobo rodan hog?
Iq! Ga taqi tqiyan na hiya.
english: Yes, she's sleeping in her room.

trv: Ungac, wada ngangoc soni da, mosa keeman miyah sapah ka hiya.
english: No, she's not. She just went out and will be back in the evening.

trv: Gaga mniq sapah ka tama rodan hog?
Ga mniq qnpahan ka hiya, osa qnpahan miying hiya ka iso haw!
english: He's upstairs. You can go up and find him.

trv: Ma iso Walis, bsiyaq ko ini qita iso da! Ya so embiyax na hog?
english: It's Walis. I haven't seen you in a while! How have you been?

trv: Malo hmi! Miyah ko miying sonan pprngaw.
english: I'm doing great! I came to chat with you.

trv: Gaga ino ka tama so hog?
Ga mniq hpoyan cmiyos damac ka hiya, mosa ko lmawa hiya ha.
english: He's in the kitchen cooking. Let me go call him.

trv: Wada qado rowdox qmraq rowdox da!
english: She went to the chicken coop to catch chickens.

trv: Ungac sapah ka tama rodan namo, ga mniq qnpahan ka hiya, mniq sapah taga hiya ka yamo haw!
english: Your grandfather is not at home. He's in the field. Wait for him to come back.

trv: Sndamac balay, mdakil hnigan so da!
english: I haven't seen you in a while. You've grown taller.
It's so good to see you.

trv: Sbgay monan ka kalac nii, bsaan rowan kolo hoda ha.
english: Here's a pineapple for you. Put it in the refrigerator.

trv: Bsiyaq ini miyah da, lmawa ko kana mnswayi miyah mkan idaw.
english: It's been a while. Let's have a meal together.

trv: Ini hoya, mimah ko ocya do malo da, emta strngan pprngaw.
english: No need to bother. I'll just have tea. Let's sit in the living room and chat.

trv: Mhoway so balay wah! Mosa ko da!
english: Thank you for your hospitality. I have to go now.

trv: Hndo smipaq sayang balay ka rowdox nii, dsi sapah so thoway mkan.
english: This chicken was just freshly killed. Take it home and enjoy it slowly.

trv: Smtrong ko sonan gbiyan koson hog?
english: Can I make an appointment with you tomorrow afternoon?

trv: Smtrong ta sapah pyasan hog? Ro-ing ta.
english: How about meeting at school? We need to shoot a video.

trv: Saw kiya do mosa ta pslian, plokos ko lokos sbiyaw mosa.
english: Then let's go to the community center. I'll wear folk costume.

trv: Tnphpah kana ka phpah snegil alang ta o soyang balay qtaan, taga emphpah siida do o miyah miying sonan wah!
english: The cherry blossoms in our tribe are beautiful when they bloom. Come find me when the flowers bloom!

trv: Emptaga dhoq srnabaw na, oxay soqi bsiyaq balay da!
english: That would have to wait until spring. It's too late, isn't it?

trv: Saw kiya do smgasoc siida ka miyah so da haw!
Malo wah! Bsaon mo balay lnglongan.
english: Alright! I'm looking forward to it!

trv: Hyaon ka mosa so nniqan alang hog?
english: May I ask why you decided to move back to the tribe?
I want to return to teach at the local school.

trv: Ma oxay mniqan paro alang tmgsa patas?
english: Why not teach in the city?

trv: Yasa lnglongon mo balay ka alang mo, tay saw tdowa smbrinah alang mo nanaq.
english: Because I miss my hometown and I also want to give back to the tribe.

trv: Mkla so bi tminon, ima ka tnegsa sonan?
english: You're very skilled at weaving, who taught you?

trv: Bobo rodan mo, hiya balay mkla bi tminon mniq alang ta.
english: It was my grandmother, she is the most skilled weaver in our tribe.
How did you develop an interest in learning weaving?

trv: Gaya ta ka tminon, mkpeiyox ko pllotoc ka gaya ta.
english: Weaving is a part of our culture, and I want to ensure its continuity.

trv: Malo bi mahon ka sinaw balay nii.
Ma so mkla balay, bsiyaq smalo sinaw nii?
english: You're really talented. Does it take a long time to make?

trv: Ini, saw hari kingal jiyax iyax sngayan do malo da.
english: No, it only takes about a week.

trv: Niqan osik ni pixil ka yako hini, hnoma yako nanaq kana.
english: I have chili and lokiy, both grown by myself!

trv: Kana o dha kbkoy mrimal pila.
Koxol mo bi ka lokos nii, piya pila hog?
english: I like this piece of clothing. How much is it?

trv: Rima kbkoy pila ka lokos nii.
Soqi mkray brigan da! Ini tdowa mhoway hari hog?
english: It's too expensive. Can't you lower the price a bit?

trv: Ini tdowa da, mhoway dongan do o ongac ka mskori ko pila da.
english: No, if I lower it further, I'll lose money.

trv: Iq wah! Saw kiya do marig ko kingal mqalox lokos.
english: Alright then, I'll take a black piece of clothing.

trv: Marig ko yayo ni kama nii.
english: I want this knife and this pot.

trv: Kana o emposal kbkoy pila, snalo baga mo nanaq nii, mosa bsiyaq balay dmooy.
english: It's a total of 2000 dollars. I handmade these, and they are guaranteed to last a long time.

trv: Pgkla ko lopong mo miyah marig, tdowa mosa mhoway hari na hog?
english: I'll introduce my friend to buy. Can you give a further discount?

trv: Iq wah! Mhoway mo hari biqon iso.
english: Alright! I'll give you a 20% discount.

trv: Iyah qmita cikoh wah! Ana saw lokos, bonoh niqan brigon kana.
english: Come and take a look! We sell clothes and hats.

trv: Kingal lokos o tro kbkoy mrimal pila, tro lokos o maxal kbkoy pila.
english: One piece of clothing is 350 dollars, three pieces for 1000 dollars.

trv: Marig ko kingal do malo da, bqani knan bgorah na.
english: I'll just buy one piece, please give me a new one.

trv: Embiyax so, mkmarig ko hlama dhqoy ni mqri.
english: Hello, I would like to buy sticky rice and braised pork with maqaw pepper.

trv: Wada qdoan marig kana ka idaw da. Niqan ko neygi na, marig so?
english: The rice is sold out. I have tana pancakes, would you like to buy them?

trv: Han! Biqi ko kingal, miyah ko babaw dongan marig idaw.
english: Alright, please give me one. I'll come back next time to buy rice.

trv: Iq wah! Dmayaw ko sonan lboan loboy, kana o mrimal pila.
english: Okay, I'll pack it in a bag for you. That'll be 50 dollars.

trv: Embiyax namo kana? prajing ta da!
Embiyax namo kana? emptgsa ko qori oqon Troko ka sayang.
english: Hello everyone. Today I am going to teach you how to say food in Telugu.

trv: Mkla so qmbahang ka kari mo hog?
english: Do you understand what the teacher says?

trv: Mtgsa,ini ko kla.rngaw pxal dori hog?
english: I don't understand. Can you repeat it again?

trv: Ini ko qbahang, paro hari hnang so rmngaw hog?
english: I can't hear you, can you speak louder?
Look here, please! Repeat after me.

trv: Spog pxal dori.paro hari hnang so.
english: Read it again. Please speak louder.

trv: Mtgsa, smhongi ko madas ppatas da.
english: I forgot to bring my pen.

trv: Mtgsa, smhongi ko madas ssros da.
english: I forgot to bring my eraser.

trv: Siyok kiyig mnseopo matas sonan ka ssros.
english: Please borrow erasers from your classmates.
